item.title: Machine Learning for Frauster Detection
item.description:
Enron Fraud Indentification

The main purpose of this project is using machine learning algorithm to detect fraudsters. Those persons are main criminals in Enron scandal. We would like to make a learning model to predict those people by using multiple variables which are reported in financial sheets and emailling list â€¦
